main event: A UFO was observed and tracked on radar near Hilliard, Ohio, on September 7, 1961.
interesting points: The object was brighter than a star and changed brightness,It moved rapidly upwards and away from the observer,The object was described as a rounded green-color and compared to the size of a grapefruit,The sighting lasted for approximately 20 minutes and was confirmed via radar,It was noted that the object appeared to be a big white ball at times.
witness description: Observer was a homemaker aged 28, with four sons present during the sighting.
